description: Broker and dealer ICAP has donated all revenues and commission from one day's trading to charities around the world for the last 24 years.
title: Pictures of Prince Harry at ICAP's 2016 charity day
title_page: Pictures of Prince Harry at ICAP's 2016 charity day - Business Insider
text:
Prince Harry, left, shaking hands with ICAP CEO Michael Spencer. Phil Toscano PA Wire/PA Images Prince Harry was the guest of honour at ICAP's 24th annual charity day in London on Wednesday.
ICAP, a trading and broking business that will soon turn into a pure finance technology business, gives away all revenue and commission made on one day each year to a series of charity partners.
To get more people to ring up ICAP and do deals on the charity day, the company drafts in celebrities and public figures each year and has them man the phones.
The Prince tried his hand at being a trader. Here's how it went:
